title: Part A
stimulusHtml:
1 point is earned for the integrand

1 point is earned for the limits

1 point is earned for the answer

lnx=5−x⇒x=3.69344 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@460F@

Therefore, the graphs of y = ln x and y = 5 - x intersect in the first quadrant at the point (A, B) = (3.69344, 1.30656).

Area= ∫ 0 B (5−y− e y )dy           =2.986 (or 2.985) OR Area= ∫ 1 A lnx dx+  ∫ A 5 ( 5−x )dx           =2.986 (or 2.985)
